description:
Zoro and the others dash out of BakuraTown on the treasure ship filled with food! Luffy catches up to them bringing ahuge bucket of fresh water! Then, they distribute the food and the water to thepeople of Okobore Town who were thirsty and hungry.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Ankunft des Essensschiffes! – Ruffytaro revanchiert sich!
Le char de vivres. Luffytaro s`acquitte de ses dettes !
The Coming of the Treasure Ship! Luffytaro Returns the Favor!
Прибытие корабля с сокровищами! Луффитаро возвращает долг!
宝船到来 ルフィ太郎の恩返し!
